response.original_title: In The Name Of Love The Life And Death Of Diana Princess Of Wales
response.overview: In the Name of Love The Life and Death of Diana, Princess of Wales  This balanced and revealing program examines how a beguiling teenager became a despairing royal wife, but grew into a humanitarian figure of international stature.  Wonderful footage of Diana at her most glamorous is combined with expert commentary from her biographer, Sarah Bradford. Dianaâ€™s extraordinary life and the unbelievable tragedy of her death are seen in their true perspective.
response.title: In The Name Of Love The Life And Death Of Diana Princess Of Wales
